panels.description: Summary of high-level status of individual miners.
panels.title: Miner Status

panels.description: Current real hashrate based on shares from last 10 seconds.
panels.title: Total HR

panels.description: Average temperature from max temperatures on miner (chip sensor measure or estimate)
panels.title: Temperature

panels.description: Status of individual defined pool connections
panels.title: Client Status - Dead Pools

panels.description: Status of individual defined pool connections
panels.title: Client Status - Active (Mining) Pools

panels.description: 20  seconds MCR is calculated and miners with lowest result are shown. Links are on IP address.

targets.expr:
bottomk(10, 
    sort(
        sum by (building, instance) (rate(hashboard_shares[20s])) * 2^32
        /
        sum by(building, instance) (hashboard_nominal_hashrate_gigahashes_per_second * 1e9)
    )
)

panels.title: 10 Miners with lowest MCR

panels.description: Maximum temperature is taken from each instance (miner).  Minimum, Average, and Maximum is then calculated.
panels.title: Min, Avg, Max Temperature

panels.description: Estimated power consumption in Watts and power limit.
panels.title: Power Limit & Est. Consumption (W)

panels.description: Maximum temperature is taken from each instance (miner).  Minimum, Average, and Maximum is then calculated.
panels.title: Min, Avg, Max Fan Speed

panels.description: Power limit is taken from each instance (miner).  Minimum, Average, and Maximum is then calculated.
panels.title: Min, Avg, Max Power Limit

panels.description: Number of instances that are scraped successfully (Up) or not (Down).
panels.title: Prometheus Status

panels.description: Tuner Status - in case of per-hashboard tuning, maximum status is used.
panels.title: Tuner Status
